name: Academy Drake
oracle_text:
Kicker {4} (You may pay an additional {4} as you cast this spell.)
Flying
If Academy Drake was kicked, it enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it.

name: Academy Journeymage
oracle_text:
This spell costs {1} less to cast if you control a Wizard.
When Academy Journeymage enters the battlefield, return target creature an opponent controls to its owner's hand.
flavor_text: "We don't choose who comes here. We choose how long they stay."

name: Adamant Will
oracle_text: Target creature gets +2/+2 and gains indestructible until end of turn. (Damage and effects that say "destroy" don't destroy it.)
flavor_text: The shield took a year to craft, a month to enchant, and a decade to master—all for one glorious moment.

name: Adventurous Impulse
oracle_text: Look at the top three cards of your library. You may reveal a creature or land card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.
flavor_text: Every odyssey begins with a single step.

name: Aesthir Glider
oracle_text:
Flying
Aesthir Glider can't block.
flavor_text: An ancient device recovered from a thawing glacier high in the Karplusan mountains.

name: Ancient Animus
oracle_text: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control if it's legendary. Then it fights target creature an opponent controls. (Each deals damage equal to its power to the other.)
flavor_text: Multani's mind grasped for consciousness as rage itself rebuilt his body.

name: Arbor Armament
oracle_text: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. That creature gains reach until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"Llanowar's boughs are ever ready
To unleash an autumn of steel leaves."
—"Song of Freyalise"

name: Arcane Flight
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and has flying.
flavor_text: The Tolarian Academies are known for their magical research, powerful sorcerers, and accidental destruction of ecosystems.

name: Artificer's Assistant
oracle_text:
Flying
Whenever you cast a historic spell, scry 1. (Artifacts, legendaries, and Sagas are historic. To scry 1, look at the top card of your library, then you may put that card on the bottom of your library.)

name: Aven Sentry
oracle_text: Flying
flavor_text: "My flock flew from a distant continent ruined by cataclysm and war. Benalia gave us shelter to end our exodus."

name: Baloth Gorger
oracle_text:
Kicker {4} (You may pay an additional {4} as you cast this spell.)
If Baloth Gorger was kicked, it enters the battlefield with three +1/+1 counters on it.
flavor_text: A baloth only cares about the many things it eats and the few things that eat it.

name: Befuddle
oracle_text:
Target creature gets -4/-0 until end of turn.
Draw a card.
flavor_text:
"The trick to talking sense into Keldons is getting them to hold still. I learned that from Radha."
—Jhoira

name: Benalish Honor Guard
oracle_text: Benalish Honor Guard gets +1/+0 for each legendary creature you control.
flavor_text:
"The true measure of all heroes is not what they achieve, but who they inspire."
—*Triumph of Gerrard*

name: Blessed Light
oracle_text: Exile target creature or enchantment.
flavor_text: Enchanted by mage-smiths and blessed by priests, Benalish windows let in light and cast out darkness.

name: Blessing of Belzenlok
oracle_text: Target creature gets +2/+1 until end of turn. If it's legendary, it also gains lifelink until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"My heart is not mine, it is Belzenlok's. All hearts are his, and all blood."
—"Rite of Belzenlok"

name: Blink of an Eye
oracle_text:
Kicker {1}{U} (You may pay an additional {1}{U} as you cast this spell.)
Return target nonland permanent to its owner's hand. If this spell was kicked, draw a card.

name: Bloodstone Goblin
oracle_text: Whenever you cast a spell, if that spell was kicked, Bloodstone Goblin gets +1/+1 and gains menace until end of turn. (It can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)
flavor_text: The stone whispers tales of darkness and fire. She replies, "Tell me more."

name: Bloodtallow Candle
oracle_text: {6}, {T}, Sacrifice Bloodtallow Candle: Target creature gets -5/-5 until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"Bring me an angel feather, and I will give you one death in return. There can be no turning back once the candle is lit."
—Whisper, blood liturgist

name: Broken Bond
oracle_text: Destroy target artifact or enchantment. You may put a land card from your hand onto the battlefield.
flavor_text: "I can't bear to see another plane broken before I make my own home whole. I'm sorry, but my watch is over."

name: Cabal Evangel
flavor_text: "All hail the Demonlord Belzenlok, Evincar of the Stronghold, Scion of Darkness, Doom of Fools, Lord of the Wastes, Master of the Ebon Hand, Eternal Patriarch of the Cabal . . ."

name: Cabal Paladin
oracle_text: Whenever you cast a historic spell, Cabal Paladin deals 2 damage to each opponent. (Artifacts, legendaries, and Sagas are historic.)
flavor_text:
"The Demonlord has ruled every age. Every ruin, myth, and nightmare proves his power."
—"Rite of Belzenlok"

name: Caligo Skin-Witch
oracle_text:
Kicker {3}{B} (You may pay an additional {3}{B} as you cast this spell.)
When Caligo Skin-Witch enters the battlefield, if it was kicked, each opponent discards two cards.
flavor_text: "Take their faces. The lips of these unbelievers may yet honor the Demonlord."

name: Call the Cavalry
oracle_text: Create two 2/2 white Knight creature tokens with vigilance.
flavor_text: Benalish citizens born under the same constellations share a star-clan. Their loyalty to one another interlaces the Seven Houses.

name: Charge
oracle_text: Creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"Honor rides before us. All we have to do is catch up."
—Danitha Capashen

name: Cloudreader Sphinx
oracle_text:
Flying
When Cloudreader Sphinx enters the battlefield, scry 2. (Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)

name: Cold-Water Snapper
oracle_text: Hexproof (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)
flavor_text: For generations, the inhabitants of Orvada have hungered for turtle soup. For generations, the turtles have frustrated their ambitions.

name: Corrosive Ooze
oracle_text: Whenever Corrosive Ooze blocks or becomes blocked by an equipped creature, destroy all Equipment attached to that creature at end of combat.
flavor_text: Nothing tastes finer to an ooze than a priceless family heirloom.

name: Dark Bargain
oracle_text: Look at the top three cards of your library. Put two of them into your hand and the other into your graveyard. Dark Bargain deals 2 damage to you.
flavor_text: "I have pustules of the great Ratadrabik, very cheap. No? Surely you'll want a tincture of Nevinyrral's pulverized remains. Genuine!"

name: D'Avenant Trapper
oracle_text: Whenever you cast a historic spell, tap target creature an opponent controls. (Artifacts, legendaries, and Sagas are historic.)
flavor_text:
"Go swiftly, clever arrow, and teach
The philosophy of stillness."
—D'Avenant verse

name: Deathbloom Thallid
oracle_text: When Deathbloom Thallid dies, create a 1/1 green Saproling creature token.
flavor_text:
"Nature is not always gentle or kind, but all life begets life."
—Marwyn of Llanowar

name: Deep Freeze
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has base power and toughness 0/4, has defender, loses all other abilities, and is a blue Wall in addition to its other colors and types.
flavor_text: For cryomancers, studying the Ice Age isn't just an academic exercise.

name: Demonic Vigor
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +1/+1.
When enchanted creature dies, return that card to its owner's hand.
flavor_text: In the Cabal, death is just another mark of devotion.

name: Divest
oracle_text: Target player reveals their hand. You choose an artifact or creature card from it. That player discards that card.
flavor_text: Flittersprites collect unusually valuable things: coins of fallen empires, baby teeth, and memories of treasured names.

name: Divination
oracle_text: Draw two cards.
flavor_text:
"Half of your studies will be learning the laws of magic. The other half will be bending them."
—Naru Meha, master wizard

name: Drudge Sentinel
oracle_text: {3}: Tap Drudge Sentinel. It gains indestructible until end of turn. (Damage and effects that say "destroy" don't destroy it.)
flavor_text: The Cabal assured the Seven Houses that hostages receive all the food and rest they require.

name: Dub
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2, has first strike, and is a Knight in addition to its other types. (It deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.)
flavor_text: "Rise, knight of New Benalia."

name: Eviscerate
oracle_text: Destroy target creature.
flavor_text:
"Fear the dark if you must, but don't mistake sunlight for safety."
—Josu Vess

name: Excavation Elephant
oracle_text:
Kicker {1}{W} (You may pay an additional {1}{W} as you cast this spell.)
When Excavation Elephant enters the battlefield, if it was kicked, return target artifact card from your graveyard to your hand.

name: Feral Abomination
oracle_text: Deathtouch (Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)
flavor_text:
"Urborg used to be lovely—scenic volcanoes, respectable lich lords. Since the Cabal came with their nightmares and thrulls, it's all gone to the worms."
—Mister Lostspoons, Skulltown gossip

name: Fervent Strike
oracle_text: Target creature gets +1/+0 and gains first strike and haste until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"The flame paints a bright wheel on the sky, then shifts into a stabbing spark. The enemy falls; the smoke of victory rises."
—"Legends of the Firedancer"

name: Fiery Intervention
oracle_text:
Choose one —
• Fiery Intervention deals 5 damage to target creature.
• Destroy target artifact.
flavor_text: Burning something is easy. Choosing a target can be more difficult.

name: Fire Elemental
flavor_text:
"The best way to learn from a book on pyromancy is to burn it."
—Jaya Ballard

name: Frenzied Rage
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+1 and has menace. (It can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)
flavor_text:
"The heat in our hearts sometimes rises to the surface."
—Valduk, keeper of the Flame

name: Fungal Infection
oracle_text: Target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn. Create a 1/1 green Saproling creature token.
flavor_text: To thallids, the whole world is just a pile of mulch to grow saprolings in.

name: Gaea's Protector
oracle_text: Gaea's Protector must be blocked if able.
flavor_text: Fallen Phyrexians were transmuted into elementals by Gaea long ago, but Yavimaya's other inhabitants still regard them with unease.

name: Ghitu Chronicler
oracle_text:
Kicker {3}{R} (You may pay an additional {3}{R} as you cast this spell.)
When Ghitu Chronicler enters the battlefield, if it was kicked, return target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor_text: "What fire forged, fire remembers."

name: Ghitu Journeymage
oracle_text: When Ghitu Journeymage enters the battlefield, if you control another Wizard, Ghitu Journeymage deals 2 damage to each opponent.
flavor_text: The Ghitu of Shiv are as fierce and uncompromising as their volcanic home.

name: Ghitu Lavarunner
oracle_text: As long as there are two or more instant and/or sorcery cards in your graveyard, Ghitu Lavarunner gets +1/+0 and has haste.
flavor_text: Tolarians teach the theory of pyromancy. The Ghitu prefer applied research.

name: Gideon's Reproach
oracle_text: Gideon's Reproach deals 4 damage to target attacking or blocking creature.
flavor_text: On Amonkhet, Gideon lost both his sural and his faith in himself. But he can still throw a punch, and he still knows a bad guy when he sees one.

name: Gift of Growth
oracle_text:
Kicker {2} (You may pay an additional {2} as you cast this spell.)
Untap target creature. It gets +2/+2 until end of turn. If this spell was kicked, that creature gets +4/+4 until end of turn instead.

name: Grow from the Ashes
oracle_text:
Kicker {2} (You may pay an additional {2} as you cast this spell.)
Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle. If this spell was kicked, instead search your library for two basic land cards, put them onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

name: Guardians of Koilos
oracle_text: When Guardians of Koilos enters the battlefield, you may return another target historic permanent you control to its owner's hand. (Artifacts, legendaries, and Sagas are historic.)
flavor_text: Archaeologists depend on automatons inspired by their previous discoveries at Koilos to guard the excavations.

name: Healing Grace
oracle_text: Prevent the next 3 damage that would be dealt to any target this turn by a source of your choice. You gain 3 life.
flavor_text:
"Whatever faith you have in Serra, she has more in you."
—Lyra Dawnbringer

name: Homarid Explorer
oracle_text: When Homarid Explorer enters the battlefield, target player mills four cards.
flavor_text:
"Homarids spread northward from Sarpadia as the climate cooled, raiding coastal settlements for supplies."
—*Time of Ice*

name: Invoke the Divine
oracle_text: Destroy target artifact or enchantment. You gain 4 life.
flavor_text:
"Let go of all that harms you. Cast your burdens into the darkness, and build for the faithful a house of light."
—*Song of All*, canto 1008

name: Jousting Lance
oracle_text:
Equipped creature gets +2/+0.
As long as it's your turn, equipped creature has first strike.
Equip {3} ({3}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

name: Keldon Overseer
oracle_text:
Kicker {3}{R} (You may pay an additional {3}{R} as you cast this spell.)
Haste
When Keldon Overseer enters the battlefield, if it was kicked, gain control of target creature until end of turn. Untap that creature. It gains haste until end of turn.

name: Keldon Raider
oracle_text: When Keldon Raider enters the battlefield, you may discard a card. If you do, draw a card.
flavor_text: Keldon raiders' spoils are limited to what their colos can carry. No matter the value, the rest goes up in smoke.

name: Keldon Warcaller
oracle_text: Whenever Keldon Warcaller attacks, put a lore counter on target Saga you control.
flavor_text:
"The Mountain gave the Flame to Kradak to light the furnaces of his people's hearts. The wanderers became Keldons, and he the first warlord."
—"The Flame of Keld"

name: Knight of New Benalia
flavor_text: The mage-smiths of New Benalia have perfected the art of blending fine steel and enchanted glass into weapons that are both beautiful and deadly. Only elite knights are entrusted with these martial works of art.

name: Krosan Druid
oracle_text:
Kicker {4}{G} (You may pay an additional {4}{G} as you cast this spell.)
When Krosan Druid enters the battlefield, if it was kicked, you gain 10 life.
flavor_text: "Druids endure disaster as seeds endure winter. Now Krosa blooms once more."

name: Llanowar Elves
oracle_text: {T}: Add {G}.
flavor_text: As patient and generous as life, as harsh and merciless as nature.

name: Llanowar Envoy
oracle_text: {1}{G}: Add one mana of any color.
flavor_text:
"Cherish this world in honor of the martyrs who saved it. We too must be prepared to give our lives."
—*The Mending of Dominaria*

name: Llanowar Scout
oracle_text: {T}: You may put a land card from your hand onto the battlefield.
flavor_text: Llanowar elfhames occupy different heights within the great forest. Elves of the Loridalh and Kelfae hames can see neither earth nor sky.

name: Mammoth Spider
oracle_text: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)
flavor_text: Most spiders of Llanowar disdain elvish alliances. No elf has as many beautiful eyes or as many strong arms.

name: Meandering River
oracle_text:
Meandering River enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {W} or {U}.
flavor_text:
"Everywhere you look, this world is healing from its wounds. Aren't you ready to do the same?"
—Jhoira, to Teferi

name: Mesa Unicorn
oracle_text: Lifelink
flavor_text: The unicorns of Sursi are a manifestation of Serra's joy and compassion. They frolic and dance like children, offering blessings to anyone they encounter.

name: Navigator's Compass
oracle_text:
When Navigator's Compass enters the battlefield, you gain 3 life.
{T}: Until end of turn, target land you control becomes the basic land type of your choice in addition to its other types.
flavor_text: The *Weatherlight* can no longer planeshift, but it can traverse Dominaria with ease.

name: Opt
oracle_text:
Scry 1.
Draw a card.
flavor_text: The crystal pulsed with the power of Teferi's planeswalker spark. Had Jhoira given him a blessing or a curse?

name: Pardic Wanderer
oracle_text: Trample
flavor_text:
"To the head of Archaeological Findings: The excavation schedule at dig site 93-beta must be revised. Part of the site has walked off."
—Tolarian field dispatch

name: Pegasus Courser
oracle_text:
Flying
Whenever Pegasus Courser attacks, another target attacking creature gains flying until end of turn.
flavor_text: A pegasus chooses its rider, bearing the worthy into the clouds and tossing all others to the ground.

name: Pierce the Sky
oracle_text: Pierce the Sky deals 7 damage to target creature with flying.
flavor_text: Llanowar elves conceal their ballistae in the upper canopy of the forest, ready to clear the skies of any intruder.

name: Powerstone Shard
oracle_text: {T}: Add {C} for each artifact you control named Powerstone Shard.
flavor_text:
"Light passing through a powerstone is refracted by eternity and colored by planar energy. I wonder how the world appeared through Urza's eyes?"
—Teferi

name: Primordial Wurm
flavor_text:
"You can hear its tail thrashing from a mile away. Keep in mind that its jaws may already be half a mile closer."
—Jenson Carthalion, Yavimaya exile

name: Pyromantic Pilgrim
oracle_text: Haste (This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.)
flavor_text: "From the volcanoes of Shiv to the Balduvian steppes, I have sought a worthy teacher. At last, I have found one."

name: Radiating Lightning
oracle_text: Radiating Lightning deals 3 damage to target player and 1 damage to each creature that player controls.
flavor_text: As the Cabal legions pushed into Shiv, they learned not to stand so close together.

name: Rampaging Cyclops
oracle_text: Rampaging Cyclops gets -2/-0 as long as two or more creatures are blocking it.
flavor_text: Keldon warriors take advantage of the cyclops's inability to focus on more than one thing at a time.

name: Rat Colony
oracle_text:
Rat Colony gets +1/+0 for each other Rat you control.
A deck can have any number of cards named Rat Colony.
flavor_text: Wreckage from the Phyrexian Invasion provided the rats with a seemingly unlimited number of breeding grounds.

name: Relic Runner
oracle_text: Relic Runner can't be blocked if you've cast a historic spell this turn. (Artifacts, legendaries, and Sagas are historic.)
flavor_text: Her knack for tampering with wards got her kicked out of the academy, but they also got her back in.

name: Rescue
oracle_text: Return target permanent you control to its owner's hand.
flavor_text: With just a few seconds to escape, Deryan saved Hurkyl's editions on restoring physical objects from ash.

name: Run Amok
oracle_text: Target attacking creature gets +3/+3 and gains trample until end of turn.
flavor_text: Keld faced an apocalypse to fulfill a dire prophecy. Now Keldons have nothing left to believe in except themselves.

name: Saproling Migration
oracle_text:
Kicker {4} (You may pay an additional {4} as you cast this spell.)
Create two 1/1 green Saproling creature tokens. If this spell was kicked, create four of those tokens instead.
flavor_text: Thallids herd saprolings from place to place in search of detritus to feed them.

name: Seismic Shift
oracle_text: Destroy target land. Up to two target creatures can't block this turn.
flavor_text:
"Shiv is a restless land. It heaves ash, bleeds lava, and scabs over in black obsidian."
—*The First Eruption*

name: Sergeant-at-Arms
oracle_text:
Kicker {2}{W} (You may pay an additional {2}{W} as you cast this spell.)
When Sergeant-at-Arms enters the battlefield, if it was kicked, create two 1/1 white Soldier creature tokens.
flavor_text: Knights get the glory. Soldiers get things done.

name: Serra Disciple
oracle_text:
Flying, first strike
Whenever you cast a historic spell, Serra Disciple gets +1/+1 until end of turn. (Artifacts, legendaries, and Sagas are historic.)
flavor_text: Theologians now believe the Ancestor was another divine form of Serra.

name: Shivan Fire
oracle_text:
Kicker {4} (You may pay an additional {4} as you cast this spell.)
Shivan Fire deals 2 damage to target creature. If this spell was kicked, it deals 4 damage instead.
flavor_text: Sometimes Shivan dragons toy with their food. Other times they just cook it.

name: Short Sword
oracle_text:
Equipped creature gets +1/+1.
Equip {1} ({1}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)
flavor_text:
"Sometimes the only difference between a martyr and a hero is a sword."
—Captain Sisay, *Memoirs*

name: Skirk Prospector
oracle_text: Sacrifice a Goblin: Add {R}.
flavor_text: Deep beneath the ruined continent of Otaria, there's a mine where goblins still work, ignorant of the destruction above.

name: Skittering Surveyor
oracle_text: When Skittering Surveyor enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
flavor_text: Like a cross between a spider and a spyglass, but friendlier.

name: Soul Salvage
oracle_text: Return up to two target creature cards from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor_text: The first mistake the Grimnant knights made was bullying the owner of an Urborg corpse shop. Their second mistake was dying.

name: Sparring Construct
oracle_text: When Sparring Construct dies, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control.
flavor_text: The trainers were a gift of gratitude from the wizards of Tolaria West to the knights of New Benalia for their aid during the Talas Incursion.

name: Stronghold Confessor
oracle_text:
Kicker {3} (You may pay an additional {3} as you cast this spell.)
Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)
If Stronghold Confessor was kicked, it enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it.

name: Syncopate
oracle_text: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {X}. If that spell is countered this way, exile it instead of putting it into its owner's graveyard.
flavor_text: The fire spell stuttered and broke. Its pieces reached Teferi out of rhythm, meaningless.

name: Temporal Machinations
oracle_text: Return target creature to its owner's hand. If you control an artifact, draw a card.
flavor_text: The Cabal soldier blinked and found day had become night, he had a face full of thistle seeds, and the old man was nowhere to be seen.

name: Thallid Omnivore
oracle_text: {1}, Sacrifice another creature: Thallid Omnivore gets +2/+2 until end of turn. If a Saproling was sacrificed this way, you gain 2 life.
flavor_text: Thelon of Havenwood created thallids as a food source in times of darkness. Thallids did the same with saprolings.

name: Timber Gorge
oracle_text:
Timber Gorge enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {R} or {G}.
flavor_text: Glaciers, torrential floods, and temporal disturbances came and went. The mountains yet stood, unchanged.

name: Tolarian Scholar
flavor_text: The Tolarian Academies embrace a tradition of study and research while discouraging the kinds of experiments that ruined the original island of Tolaria.

name: Tragic Poet
oracle_text: {T}, Sacrifice Tragic Poet: Return target enchantment card from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor_text: "In a healing world I write—I, who will never be healed. Let my last gift be one of memory: from a thousand lost thoughts, choose one, and remember my name."

name: Unwind
oracle_text: Counter target noncreature spell. Untap up to three lands.
flavor_text:
"A problem is only a problem if you don't have the tools to correct it."
—Jhoira

name: Vicious Offering
oracle_text:
Kicker—Sacrifice a creature. (You may sacrifice a creature in addition to any other costs as you cast this spell.)
Target creature gets -2/-2 until end of turn. If this spell was kicked, that creature gets -5/-5 until end of turn instead.

name: Vodalian Arcanist
oracle_text: {T}: Add {C}. Spend this mana only to cast an instant or sorcery spell.
flavor_text: The Vodalian Empire tends to be insular. The scholarly Volshe caste are the exception, using education as an antidote to xenophobia.

name: Voltaic Servant
oracle_text: At the beginning of your end step, untap target artifact.
flavor_text: A missing piece in search of a puzzle.

name: Warlord's Fury
oracle_text:
Creatures you control gain first strike until end of turn.
Draw a card.
flavor_text:
"The old ways were for a winter world. We do what's best for us, not for the past. We are Keldons!"
—Grand Warlord Radha

name: Windgrace Acolyte
oracle_text:
Flying
When Windgrace Acolyte enters the battlefield, mill three cards and you gain 3 life.
flavor_text: Acolytes of the lost Lord Windgrace fight to keep Urborg relics out of Cabal hands.

name: Yavimaya Sapherd
oracle_text: When Yavimaya Sapherd enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 green Saproling creature token.
flavor_text:
"When their community grows cluttered, thallids begin a traditional bobbing dance, then trek out in all directions."
—*Sarpadian Empires, vol. III*
